Statement Of Vibe At To Enfopol

30 Nov 1999

Vibe.at, the Austrian Internet user community,\nreleased a statement about ENFOPOL's plans and\nwhat the technical need would mean to the providers.\nVery interesting read. \nStellungnahme von VIBE!AT zu ENFOPOL\nThe original statement is in German. Use\nBabelfish\nand enter the URL\nhttp://metternich.vibe.at/aktionen/199911/ to\ntranslate it to your language.
